def find_floors(n, x, floors = 0):
    if n > 0:
        if floors == 0:
            return find_floors(n - 2, x, floors + 1)
        else:
            return find_floors(n - x, x, floors + 1)
    else:
        return floors

t = int(input())

for i in range(t):
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    print(find_floors(n, x))

def find_floors(n, x):
    floors = 0
    while n > 0:
        if floors == 0:
            n -= 2
        else:
            n -= x
        floors += 1

    return floors

t = int(input())

for i in range(t):
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    print(find_floors(n, x))

def find_floor(n, x):
    floor = 1
    n -= 2
    if n == 0:
        return floor
    floor += 1
    while n > 0:
        n -= x
        floor += 1
    return floor

def find_floor(n, x):  # n = no. of eggs, x = no. of floors
    floor = 0  # initial floor
    while n > 0:  # while eggs are left
        if floor == 0:  # if floor is 0
            n -= 2  # drop 2 eggs
        else:
            n -= x
        floor += 1
    return floor

t = int(input())

for i in range(t):
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    print(find_floor(n, x))
